      static void makeText(javafx.stage.Stage ownerStage, java.lang.String toastMsg, int toastDelay, int fadeInDelay, int fadeOutDelay, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)

    • Method Detail

      • makeText

        public static void makeText(javafx.stage.Stage ownerStage,
                            java.lang.String toastMsg,
                            int toastDelay,
                            int fadeInDelay,
                            int fadeOutDelay,
                            javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Generates a Toast message that will display helpful information to the user, temporarily, using the given time and text attributes. Adds Toast message to specified stage.
        Parameters:
        ownerStage - Stage to add the Toast message to
        toastMsg - String text to be set as Toast contents
        toastDelay - Time the Toast is to be displayed
        fadeInDelay - Time the Toast takes to fade into the stage
        fadeOutDelay - Time the Toast takes to fade out of the stage
        color - Color of the Text that will be displayed
